Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Vaughn and the Chicago White Sox will face Matthew Boyd, who will start for the Cleveland Guardians.
The Guardians pitching staff is 10th in the majors with a collective 8.8 strikeouts per nine innings.
The White Sox have pitched to a 4.86 ERA this season, which ranks 29th in baseball.
First pitch is set for 2:10 p.m. ET for the final game of a three-game series.
The game will be held at Guaranteed Rate Field in Chicago, Illinois.
The game will be broadcast on Bally Sports and available for live stream on Fubo.
